<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- X86FloatingPoint.cpp - Floating point Reg -&gt; Stack converter ------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file defines the pass which converts floating point instructions from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pseudo registers into register stack instructions.  This pass uses live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variable information to indicate where the FPn registers are used and their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lifetimes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The x87 hardware tracks liveness of the stack registers, so it is necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to implement exact liveness tracking between basic blocks. The CFG edges are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partitioned into bundles where the same FP registers must be live in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// identical stack positions. Instructions are inserted at the end of each basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block to rearrange the live registers to match the outgoing bundle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This approach avoids splitting critical edges at the potential cost of more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// live register shuffling instructions when critical edges are present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86-h">X86.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Machine instruction info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Two CFG edges are related if they leave the same block, or enter the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. The transitive closure of an edge under this relation is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LiveBundle. It represents a set of CFG edges where the live FP stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers must be allocated identically in the x87 stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A LiveBundle is usually all the edges leaving a block, or all the edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entering a block, but it can contain more edges if critical edges are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The set of live FP registers in a LiveBundle is calculated by bundleCFG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but the exact mapping of FP registers to stack slots is fixed later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LiveBundle &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bit mask of live FP registers. Bit 0 = FP0, bit 1 = FP1, &amp;c.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Mask = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number of pre-assigned live registers in FixStack. This is 0 when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack order has not yet been fixed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FixCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assigned stack order for live-in registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FixStack&#91;i&#93; == getStackEntry(i) for all i &lt; FixCount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FixStack&#91;8&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LiveBundle() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Have the live registers been assigned a stack order yet?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isFixed()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !Mask || FixCount; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Numbered LiveBundle structs. LiveBundles&#91;0&#93; is used for all CFG edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with no live FP registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SmallVector&lt;LiveBundle, 8&gt; LiveBundles;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EdgeBundles &#42;Bundles = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return a bitmask of FP registers in block&#39;s live-in list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> calcLiveInMask(MachineBasicBlock &#42;MBB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemoveFPs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(X86::FP6 - X86::FP0 == 6, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;sequential regnums&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> &gt;= X86::FP0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> &lt;= X86::FP6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> |= 1 &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> - X86::FP0);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bundleCFGRecomputeKillFlags(MachineFunction &amp;MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MachineBasicBlock &#42;MBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Current basic block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The hardware keeps track of how many FP registers are live, so we have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to model that exactly. Usually, each live register corresponds to an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP&lt;n&gt; register, but when dealing with calls, returns, and inline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assembly, it is sometimes necessary to have live scratch registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Stack&#91;8&#93;;          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP&lt;n&gt; Registers in each stack slot...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackTop = 0;      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The current top of the FP stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumFPRegs = 8             </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Including scratch pseudo-registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each live FP&lt;n&gt; register, point to its Stack&#91;&#93; entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first entries correspond to FP0-FP6, the rest are scratch registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used when we need slightly different live registers than what the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register allocator thinks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegMap&#91;NumFPRegs&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set up our stack model to match the incoming registers to MBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> setupBlockStack();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shuffle live registers to match the expectations of successor blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> finishBlockStack();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if !defined(NDEBUG) || defined(LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;DUMP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> dumpStack()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstFPRegOp == ~0U)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FirstFPRegOp = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SecondFPRegOp == ~0U &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;More than two fp operands!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SecondFPRegOp = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LiveMask |= (1 &lt;&lt; <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the operand so that later passes don&#39;t see it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.removeOperand(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    --i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    --<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We may have been carrying spurious live-ins, so make sure only the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returned registers are left live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  adjustLiveRegs(LiveMask, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LiveMask) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Quick check to see if any are possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are only four possibilities here:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) we are returning a single FP value.  In this case, it has to be in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ST(0) already, so just declare success by removing the value from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    FP Stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SecondFPRegOp == ~0U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assert that the top of stack contains the right FP register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StackTop == 1 &amp;&amp; FirstFPRegOp == getStackEntry(0) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Top of stack not the right register for RET!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ok, everything is good, mark the value as not being on the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anymore so that our assertion about the stack being empty at end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block doesn&#39;t fire.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StackTop = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we are returning two values:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) If returning the same value for both, we only have one thing in the FP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    stack.  Consider:  RET FP1, FP1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackTop == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FirstFPRegOp == SecondFPRegOp &amp;&amp; FirstFPRegOp == getStackEntry(0)&amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stack misconfiguration for RET!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Duplicate the TOS so that we return it twice.  Just pick some other FPx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register to hold it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewReg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86floatingpoint-cpp-/#ae4229c71636fbc1253e95a71288b27b9">ScratchFPReg</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    duplicateToTop(FirstFPRegOp, NewReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FirstFPRegOp = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Okay we know we have two different FPx operands now:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StackTop == 2 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Must have two values live!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3) If SecondFPRegOp is currently in ST(0) and FirstFPRegOp is currently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    in ST(1).  In this case, emit an fxch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (getStackEntry(0) == SecondFPRegOp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getStackEntry(1) == FirstFPRegOp &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown regs live&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    moveToTop(FirstFPRegOp, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 4) Finally, FirstFPRegOp must be in ST(0) and SecondFPRegOp must be in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ST(1).  Just remove both from our understanding of the stack and return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getStackEntry(0) == FirstFPRegOp &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown regs live&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getStackEntry(1) == SecondFPRegOp &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown regs live&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StackTop = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handleZeroArgFP - ST(0) = fld0    ST(0) = flds &lt;mem&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FPS::handleZeroArgFP(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DestReg = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Change from the pseudo instruction to the concrete instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.removeOperand(0); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the explicit ST(0) operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.setDesc(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;get(<a href="#acc4a1cce0acc04a92e9866fad21bb3b5">getConcreteOpcode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode())));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.addOperand(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af2c351dad09a71aa08e1d85c67ae6e53">MachineOperand::CreateReg</a>(X86::ST0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;isDef&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;isImp&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result gets pushed on the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  pushReg(DestReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.dropDebugNumber();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handleOneArgFP - fst &lt;mem&gt;, ST(0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FPS::handleOneArgFP(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDesc().getNumOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a2a5aec578e2e391e99e1705012752d84ac4169d78e1c6de9b189f31b90f1c2691">X86::AddrNumOperands</a> + 1 || <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> == 1) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can only handle fst&#42; &amp; ftst instructions!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is this the last use of the source register?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KillsSrc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.killsRegister(X86::FP0 + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;TRI=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FISTP64m is strange because there isn&#39;t a non-popping versions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have one &#95;and&#95; we don&#39;t want to pop the operand, duplicate the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the stack instead of moving it.  This ensure that popping the value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always ok.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ditto FISTTP16m, FISTTP32m, FISTTP64m, ST&#95;FpP80m.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!KillsSrc &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == X86::IST&#95;Fp64m32 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == X86::ISTT&#95;Fp16m32 ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123; X86::ADD&#95;Fp32  , X86::ADD&#95;FST0r  &#125;,   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// commutative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123; X86::ADD&#95;Fp64  , X86::ADD&#95;FST0r  &#125;,   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// commutative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123; X86::ADD&#95;Fp80  , X86::ADD&#95;FST0r  &#125;,   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// commutative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123; X86::DIV&#95;Fp32  , X86::DIVR&#95;FST0r &#125;,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handleTwoArgFP - Handle instructions like FADD and friends which are virtual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions which need to be simplified and possibly transformed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Result: ST(0) = fsub  ST(0), ST(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         ST(i) = fsub  ST(0), ST(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         ST(0) = fsubr ST(0), ST(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         ST(i) = fsubr ST(0), ST(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FPS::handleTwoArgFP(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a79bccd1176385cddbdfafb156196cc87">ASSERT&#95;SORTED</a>(<a href="#a83c82a7a8e5af3b2f88962cdec3952ef">ForwardST0Table</a>); <a href="#a79bccd1176385cddbdfafb156196cc87">ASSERT&#95;SORTED</a>(<a href="#a3f0984675b87018d44304c32575a7c47">ReverseST0Table</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a79bccd1176385cddbdfafb156196cc87">ASSERT&#95;SORTED</a>(<a href="#aaaafaa1cac63fc196f14174327a87eb5">ForwardSTiTable</a>); <a href="#a79bccd1176385cddbdfafb156196cc87">ASSERT&#95;SORTED</a>(<a href="#abe556c5eca51a99b45126470f269dc9c">ReverseSTiTable</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumOperands = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDesc().getNumOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumOperands == 3 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Illegal TwoArgFP instruction!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Dest = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Op0 = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(NumOperands - 2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Op1 = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(NumOperands - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KillsOp0 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.killsRegister(X86::FP0 + Op0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;TRI=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KillsOp1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.killsRegister(X86::FP0 + Op1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;TRI=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> &amp;dl = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDebugLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TOS = getStackEntry(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One of our operands must be on the top of the stack.  If neither is yet, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to move one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Op0 != TOS &amp;&amp; Op1 != TOS) &#123;   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No operand at TOS?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can choose to move either operand to the top of the stack.  If one of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operands is killed by this instruction, we want that one so that we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can update right on top of the old version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (KillsOp0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">      moveToTop(Op0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move dead operand to TOS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TOS = Op0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (KillsOp1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      moveToTop(Op1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TOS = Op1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All of the operands are live after this instruction executes, so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot update on top of any operand.  Because of this, we must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicate one of the stack elements to the top.  It doesn&#39;t matter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which one we pick.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      duplicateToTop(Op0, Dest, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Op0 = TOS = Dest;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      KillsOp0 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!KillsOp0 &amp;&amp; !KillsOp1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we DO have one of our operands at the top of the stack, but we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have a dead operand, we must duplicate one of the operands to a new slot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    duplicateToTop(Op0, Dest, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Op0 = TOS = Dest;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    KillsOp0 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we know that one of our operands is on the top of the stack, and at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// least one of our operands is killed by this instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((TOS == Op0 || TOS == Op1) &amp;&amp; (KillsOp0 || KillsOp1) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stack conditions not set up right!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We decide which form to use based on what is on the top of the stack, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which operand is killed by this instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;TableEntry&gt;</a> InstTable;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isForward = TOS == Op0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> updateST0 = (TOS == Op0 &amp;&amp; !KillsOp1) || (TOS == Op1 &amp;&amp; !KillsOp0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (updateST0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isForward)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstTable = <a href="#a83c82a7a8e5af3b2f88962cdec3952ef">ForwardST0Table</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isForward)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstTable = <a href="#aaaafaa1cac63fc196f14174327a87eb5">ForwardSTiTable</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstTable = <a href="#abe556c5eca51a99b45126470f269dc9c">ReverseSTiTable</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NotTOS - The register which is not on the top of stack...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NotTOS = (TOS == Op0) ? Op1 : Op0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We handle three kinds of copies: FP &lt;- FP, FP &lt;- ST, and ST &lt;- FP.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incoming stack slot into the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a5dbb1abfb6d3c14555304f9c56703234a9234cc57c43f272b55a94b0069fe62d1">Slot</a> = getSlot(SrcFP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a5dbb1abfb6d3c14555304f9c56703234a9234cc57c43f272b55a94b0069fe62d1">Slot</a>&#93; = DstFP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegMap&#91;DstFP&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a5dbb1abfb6d3c14555304f9c56703234a9234cc57c43f272b55a94b0069fe62d1">Slot</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For COPY we just duplicate the specified value to a new stack slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This could be made better, but would require substantial changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      duplicateToTop(SrcFP, DstFP, Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::IMPLICIT&#95;DEF: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All FP registers must be explicitly defined, so load a 0 instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg() - X86::FP0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Emitting LD&#95;F0 for implicit FP&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, Inst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDebugLoc(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;get(X86::LD&#95;F0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    pushReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::INLINEASM:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::INLINEASM&#95;BR: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The inline asm MachineInstr currently only &#42;uses&#42; FP registers for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;f&#39; constraint.  These should be turned into the current ST(x) register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the machine instr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are special rules for x87 inline assembly. The compiler must know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exactly how many registers are popped and pushed implicitly by the asm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise it is not possible to restore the stack state after the inline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// asm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are 3 kinds of input operands:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Popped inputs. These must appear at the stack top in ST0-STn. A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    popped input operand must be in a fixed stack slot, and it is either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    tied to an output operand, or in the clobber list. The MI has ST use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and def operands for these inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Fixed inputs. These inputs appear in fixed stack slots, but are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    preserved by the inline asm. The fixed stack slots must be STn-STm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    following the popped inputs. A fixed input operand cannot be tied to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    an output or appear in the clobber list. The MI has ST use operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and no defs for these inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 Preserved inputs. These inputs use the &quot;f&quot; constraint which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    represented as an FP register. The inline asm won&#39;t change these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    stack slots.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Outputs must be in ST registers, FP outputs are not allowed. Clobbered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers do not count as output operands. The inline asm changes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack as if it popped all the popped inputs and then pushed all the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// output operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scan the assembly for ST registers used, defined and clobbered. We can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only tell clobbers from defs by looking at the asm descriptor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> STUses = 0, STDefs = 0, STClobbers = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;unsigned, 1&gt;</a> FRegIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RCID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineasm/#af263df97504e0800bba5e552246b7370ad8e4e0d44daebe8c07cf5d6d60a4fc30">InlineAsm::MIOp&#95;FirstOperand</a>, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">         i != e &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(i).isImm(); i += 1 + <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Flags = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(i).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineasm/flag">InlineAsm::Flag</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>(Flags);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getNumOperandRegisters();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> != 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(i + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> STReg = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() - X86::FP0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (STReg &gt;= 8)</span></CodeLine>
