<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a> = <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FRegIdx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#a2a98f19750ba941ce791b75ca6d77e48">count</a>(i))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operand with constraint &quot;f&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.setReg(getSTReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operand with a single register class constraint (&quot;t&quot; or &quot;u&quot;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.setReg(X86::ST0 + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Simulate the inline asm popping its inputs and pushing its outputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StackTop -= NumSTPopped;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumSTDefs; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      pushReg(NumSTDefs - i - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this asm kills any FP registers (is the last use of them) we must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicitly emit pop instructions for them.  Do this now after the asm has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// executed so that the ST(x) numbers are not off (which would happen if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// did this inline with operand rewriting).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: this might be a non-optimal pop sequence.  We might be able to do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// better by trying to pop in stack order or something.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FPKills) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(FPKills);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isLive(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">        freeStackSlotAfter(Inst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FPKills &amp;= ~(1U &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t delete the inline asm!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FAKE&#95;USE must pop its register operand off the stack if it is killed,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because this constitutes the register&#39;s last use. If the operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is not killed, it will have its last use later, so we leave it alone.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In either case we remove the operand so later passes don&#39;t see it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::FAKE&#95;USE: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumExplicitOperands() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FAKE&#95;USE must have exactly one operand&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).isKill()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">      freeStackSlotBefore(Inst, <a href="#aa6438c766cdab5c1e26d802ef9ad14ff">getFPReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0)));</span></CodeLine>
